data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of phytoseiid mite (Acari: Phytoseiidae) from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Marina Ferraz De Camargo, Rocha, Matheus Dos Santos, Ferla, Noeli Juarez (2014): A new genus and species of phytoseiid mite (Acari: Phytoseiidae) from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest. Zootaxa 3795 (1): 91-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.1.10
